==German== {{wikipedia|lang=de}} ===Etymology=== Borrowed from {{bor|de|fr|cigarette}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˌtsi(ː).ɡaˈʁɛ.tə/}} {{i|standard}} * {{IPA|de|/tsɪɐ̯ˈʁɛ.tə/}} {{i|casual speech; chiefly northern and central Germany}} * {{audio|de|De-Zigarette.ogg|Audio}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|f||Zigaretten|Zigarettchen}} # [[cigarette#English|cigarette]] ====Declension==== {{de-decl-noun-f|n}} ====Derived terms==== {{der-top}} * {{l|de|elektrische Zigarette}} * {{l|de|elektronische Zigarette}} * {{l|de|E-Zigarette}} * {{l|de|Sportzigarette}} * {{l|de|Zigarettenautomat}} * {{l|de|Zigarettenfilter}} {{der-mid}} * {{l|de|Zigarettenhülse}} * {{l|de|Zigarettenkippe}} * {{l|de|Zigarettenschachtel}} * {{l|de|Zigarettenspitze}} {{der-bottom}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}}
